name: Detect Virtualbox Driver Installation OR Starting Of VMs
description: Adversaries can carry out malicious operations using a virtual instance to avoid detection. This rule is built to detect the registration of the Virtualbox driver or start of a Virtualbox VM.
false_positives: This may have false positives on hosts where Virtualbox is legitimately being used for operations
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:(*VBoxRT.dll,RTR3Init* OR *VBoxC.dll* OR *VBoxDrv.sys*) OR process.command_line:(*startvm* OR *controlvm*))`
